protective_factors: Explicitly denies current intent or plan ('I wouldn't do that')
Strong family deterrent ('I couldn't do that to them')
Agreement and willingness to adhere to medication change (*Sertraline* increase)
risk_factors: Presence of passive suicidal ideation ('I just wish I could disappear')
Current episode of *Major Depressive Disorder* (Moderate severity)
Guilt and feelings of failure (sense of burdening family)
clinical_actions: Reinforce safety plan focusing on family deterrents.
Monitor closely for adverse effects or worsening symptoms post-*Sertraline* dose increase.
Schedule follow-up appointment within 1-2 weeks due to dose change and current symptoms.
